property.name: outputSelectedrows
property.label: Output Selected Rows (Collection)
property.description: Record Collection variable to contain only the records that were selected in the datatable. - NOTE: These records may not contain all of the edited values.

property.name: outputSelectedRow
property.label: Output Selected Row (Object)
property.description: Record Object variable that contains the single record that was selected in the datatable. - NOTE: This is only provided when just a single record is selected.
